00028 #define ABS(x)  ((x)<0 ? -(x) : (x))

00030 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00031 {
00032   createinfo(argc, argv);
00033 
00034   // enough arguments ?
00035 
00036   if (argc < 2) {
00037     fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s [OPTIONS] state\n"
00038             "\n   -n NMAX       oscillator cut off"
00039             "\n   -o OMEGA      Oscillator constant [MeV]\n",
00040             argv[0]);
00041     exit(-1);
00042   }
00043 
00044   int nmax = HONMAX;
00045   double omega = 0.0;
00046 
00047   char c;
00048   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "n:o:")) != -1)
00049     switch (c) {
00050     case 'n':
00051       nmax = atoi(optarg);
00052       break;
00053     case 'o':
00054       omega = atof(optarg)/hbc;
00055       break;
00056     }
00057 
00058 
00059   char* slaterdetfile = argv[optind];
00060 
00061   SlaterDet Q;
00062   readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, slaterdetfile);
00063 
00064 
00065   // single-particle overlap matrix
00066   SlaterDetAux X;
00067   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00068   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00069 
00070   // Tcm
00071   double tcm;
00072   calcTCM(&Q, &X, &tcm);
00073 
00074   // derive oscillator constant from center of mass motion
00075   double omegacm = 4.0/3.0*tcm;
00076 
00077   if (omega == 0.0)
00078     omega = omegacm;
00079 
00080   
00081   // density matrix
00082 
00083   DensityMatrixHOPar par = {
00084     nmax : nmax,
00085     omega : omega,
00086     dim : dimHOBasis(nmax)
00087   };
00088 
00089   int dim = par.dim;
00090 
00091   complex double* rho = malloc(SQR(dim)*sizeof(complex double));
00092 
00093   initHOBasis(nmax);
00094 
00095   
00096   calcDensityMatrixHO(&par, &Q, &X, rho);
00097 
00098   fprintinfo(stdout);
00099   
00100   // occupation numbers
00101 
00102   fprintf(stdout, "\nusing oscillator constant: hbar Omega = %8.3f MeV\n",
00103           omega*hbc);
00104 
00105   fprintf(stdout, "\nOccupation numbers: \n");
00106 
00107   int i;
00108   int ixi, xi, N, n, l, twoj, twom, orbit, idx;
00109   double nshell, norbit[HONMAX+1];
00110 
00111   for (N=0; N<=nmax; N++) {
00112 
00113     fprintf(stdout, "\n   N=%d\t\t", N);
00114     for (n=N/2; n>=0; n--) {
00115       l=N-2*n;
00116       for (twoj=ABS(2*l-1); twoj<=2*l+1; twoj=twoj+2)
00117         fprintf(stdout, "%s\t", labelHOorbit(n, l, twoj));
00118     }
00119     fprintf(stdout, "\n");
00120 
00121     for (ixi=0; ixi<=1; ixi++) {
00122       xi = ixi ? -1 : +1;
00123       fprintf(stdout, "%c  ", ixi ? 'n' : 'p');
00124 
00125       nshell = 0.0;
00126       orbit = 0;
00127       for (n=N/2; n>=0; n--) {
00128         l=N-2*n;
00129         for (twoj=ABS(2*l-1); twoj<=2*l+1; twoj=twoj+2) {
00130           norbit[orbit] = 0.0;
00131           for (twom=-twoj; twom<=twoj; twom=twom+2) {
00132             idx = HOxinljmidx(xi, n, l, twoj, twom);
00133             norbit[orbit] += creal(rho[idx+idx*dim]);
00134           }
00135           nshell += norbit[orbit];
00136           orbit++;
00137         }
00138       }
00139       fprintf(stdout, "%6.3f\t", nshell);
00140       for (orbit=0; orbit<=N; orbit++)
00141         fprintf(stdout, "%6.3f\t", norbit[orbit]);
00142       fprintf(stdout, "\n");
00143     }
00144   }
00145   
00146   double ntot = 0.0;
00147   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00148     ntot += creal(rho[i+i*dim]);
00149 
00150   fprintf(stdout, "\nTotal Occupation: %6.3f\n", ntot);
00151   
00152 }
